TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WizardStepCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class WizardStepCollection Implements IList
public ref class WizardStepCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type WizardStepCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示控件中用作向导的 派生类的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理作为 向导（如 控件或控件）的控件中派生的对象的集合 。The class is used to store and manage a collection of -derived objects in a control that acts as a wizard, such as the control or the control. 例如， 控件使用 类作为其 属性。For example, the control uses the class for its property. 可以通过多种方式访问 中派生的对象 ：There are multiple ways you can access the -derived objects in the : - 使用 属性可 在特定的从零开始的索引处直接访问派生对象。Use the property to directly access a -derived object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用 方法可创建一个可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用 方法可将集合的内容复制 到 对象中。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用声明性语法填充集合。The following example demonstrates how to populate the collection using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/CS/wizardstepcollectiondeclarecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionDeclare/VB/wizardstepcollectiondeclarevb.aspx#3)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式填充 集合。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically populate a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例中网页的代码隐藏文件。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/CS/wizardstepcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection/VB/wizardstepcollection.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将派生的 对象添加到集合的末尾 。The method adds the -derived object to the end of the collection. 若要将 派生的对象添加到集合中的特定索引位置，请使用 方法。To add a -derived object to the collection at a specific index location, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建一个 控件，并使用 方法将 派生的 对象添加到 集合中。The following code example demonstrates programmatically creating a control and using the method to add -derived objects to the collection. 请注意，在该示例中， 控件的属性 为类的实例 。Note that in the example, the property of the control is an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定 派生对象是否包含在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a -derived object is contained in the collection. 此方法通常用于在 执行任务之前测试派生对象是否存在，例如， 从集合中删除派生的对象。This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a -derived object before performing a task, such as removing a -derived object from the collection.

param.name: array
param.span: 一个从零开始的 对象的数组，用于接收从集合复制的项。

span.span: A zero-based array of objects that receives the items copied from the collection.

param.name: index
param.span: 目标数组中该数组开始接收复制项的位置。

span.span: The position in the target array at which the array starts receiving the copied items.

summary.span: 将 集合中的所有项复制到兼容的、 对象的一维数组，从目标数组的指定索引处开始。

span.span: Copies all the items from a collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始的数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 从目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 在数组中的项之后，可以使用数组语法来访问集合中的项 。After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the collection. 作为替代方法，还可以使用 方法来创建可用于访问集合中的项的枚举器。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将 对象从集合复制到数组。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 然后循环访问该数组，以显示 每个派生的 对象的属性。The array is then iterated through to display the property of each -derived object. 请注意，在该示例中， 控件的属性 为类的实例 。Note that in the example, the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/CS/wizardstepcollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionCopyTo/VB/wizardstepcollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将派生的 对象添加到集合中的指定索引位置。The method adds the -derived object to the collection at the specified index location. 或者，可以使用 方法将派生的对象添加 到集合中。Alternatively, you can use the method to add the -derived object to the collection. 若要将 派生的对象添加到集合的末尾 ，请使用 方法。To add a -derived object to the end of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法和 方法本质上执行相同的功能。The method and the method perform essentially the same function. 调用方法时，只会将 `wizardStep` 和 `index` 参数传递给 方法。When the method is called, it simply passes the `wizardStep` and `index` parameters to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建一个 控件，并使用 方法将 派生的对象添加到 集合中。The following code example demonstrates programmatically creating a control and using the method to add -derived objects to the collection. 请注意，在该示例中， 控件的属性 为类的实例 。Note that in the example, the property of the control is an instance of the class.
